Sentencas: Methanol is an attractive energy source due to its portability and thermodynamic coke resistance by its oxygen content.
Titulo: Effects of dispersed copper nanoparticles on Ni-ceria based dry methanol fuelled low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to operate dry methanol fuel low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs), it is important to solve the problems of carbon formation and its low performance.
Titulo: Effects of dispersed copper nanoparticles on Ni-ceria based dry methanol fuelled low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, copper impregnation was selected to decrease the carbon deposition and enhance the performance at low temperature.
Titulo: Effects of dispersed copper nanoparticles on Ni-ceria based dry methanol fuelled low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The interaction of copper, ceria and nickel improves CO oxidation capacity which improves coke tolerance and nano-sized nickel copper alloys improved durability and catalytic performance under methanol feed.
Titulo: Effects of dispersed copper nanoparticles on Ni-ceria based dry methanol fuelled low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It markedly amplified the performance about 0.4 W cm(-2) at 550 degrees C with the durable operation at 1.4 A cm(-2) over 50 h. Loading copper nanoparticles is promising method for Ni-ceria based LT-SOFC using methanol fuel with high performance and stable operation.
Titulo: Effects of dispersed copper nanoparticles on Ni-ceria based dry methanol fuelled low temperature solid oxide fuel cells
